H0.text: In Greek mythology, which race of giants had a single eye in the middle of their foreheads. Hecatonchires

H1.text: In Greek mythology, which race of giants had a single eye in the middle of their foreheads. Gigantes

H2.text: In Greek mythology, which race of giants had a single eye in the middle of their foreheads. Titans

H3.text: In Greek mythology, which race of giants had a single eye in the middle of their foreheads. CYCLOPS

A4.text: In Hesiod's Theogony, the Cyclopes are described as '...only one eye was set in the middle of their foreheads...'

A5.text: In Homer's Odyssey, the Cyclopes are an uncivilized group of shepherds, one of whom, Polyphemus, the son of Poseidon, is encountered by Odysseus.
